translations: v.使敏感（sensitize 的 ing 形式）

phrs.translation: 敏化, 光敏处理, 敏化法
敏化染料, 敏感染料, 致敏染料
敏化剂, 增感剂, 增感性, 致敏剂
染料增感, 色素增感型
敏化处理, 敏化处置

sentences.sentence: "Our study is the first success in sensitizing obese mice on a high-fat diet to leptin," he said.
sentences.translation: “我们的研究是第一次成功地通过高脂肪膳食使肥胖小鼠的瘦素敏化。”他结着说。

sentences.sentence: It is well know that EDTA is the sensitizing agent which has been reported by many papers concerned.
sentences.translation: EDTA是辐射敏化剂，这已经被证实，而且相关报道很多。

sentences.sentence: Some call it psychic ability, I like to call it sensitizing the inner sixth sense so that you can join the lucky ones.
sentences.translation: 有人称之为精神的能力，我喜欢称之为敏感的内在第六感，以便您可以参加幸运的。
